{{Talk header}} {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject Military history|class=GA|B1=y|B2=y|B3=y|B4=y|B5=y|Maritime=yes|Spanish=yes|OMT=1}} {{WikiProject Ships|class=GA|B1=y|B2=y|B3=y|B4=y|B5=y}} {{WikiProject Spain|class=GA|importance=low}} }}{{ArticleHistory |action1=GAN |action1date=01:34, 9 July 2013 (UTC) |action1link=/GA1 |action1result=listed |action1oldid=563457972
|action2=GTC |action2date=16:58, 2 September 2013 (UTC) |action2link=Wikipedia:Featured topic candidates/Battleships of Spain/archive1 |action2result=promoted
|ftname=Battleships of Spain |currentstatus=GA |topic=Warfare }} == Infobox ==
The information in the infobox is taken from the exhaustive article in ''Warship International'' this year. The facts are above questioning. Also, Spain has been using metric since the 19th Century, so in an article about a Spanish warship it's right to use the metric measurements first, which in any case are the official ones used. --[[User:Harlsbottom|Harlsbottom]] ([[User talk:Harlsbottom|talk]] | [[User:Harlsbottom/Library|library]])
==Guns Recover==
The España's guns, wasn´t recover for ons submarine, they, was recover by [http://www.revistanaval.com/armada/buques1/kanguro.htm Kanguro], one submarines rescue ship ([[:es:Buque de rescate de submarinos Kanguro]])
Sorry... for my short english
--[[Special:Contributions/217.15.37.209|217.15.37.209]] ([[User talk:217.15.37.209|talk]]) 13:04, 10 June 2008 (UTC) :Your English is good enough if your info's right. [[User:Trekphiler|Trekphiler]] ([[User talk:Trekphiler|talk]]) 13:55, 10 June 2008 (UTC)
:::Thx, i write usually in spanish wikipedia ([[es:Usuario:Takashi kurita]]). You can see this info in a lots of sites and books, but all this info is write in spanish.
::: in this [http://www.vidamaritima.com/2007/05/kanguro.html web] you can see guns rescue photographs and kanguro's history (datas from the " Revista General de Marina." (oficial)) ::: In the [http://www.armada.mde.es/ArmadaPortal/page/Portal/ArmadaEspannola/conocenos_organizacion/03_Fuerza--01_Flota--06_FLOSUB--05_historia_clases_submarinos_es#Kanguroarmada spanish navy] web, you can see the kanguro (sorry again for my bad english)
:::--[[User:Takashi kurita|Takashi kurita]] ([[User talk:Takashi kurita|talk]]) 18:16, 10 June 2008 (UTC)
==Mistake==
Article says : "In 1920 she joined the celebration of Chile's centennary"
[[Chile]] independence was in 1810... ¿Centenary in 1920?
--[[User:Takashi kurita|Takashi kurita]] ([[User talk:Takashi kurita|talk]]) 11:07, 11 June 2008 (UTC)
==More==
1st says : "In January 1924 she grounded in Chilean waters on the return to Spain, being refloated with some difficulty"
Then says :
"During these operations, she went aground at Cape Tres Forcas, Morocco, near Melilla, in fog on 26 August 1923"
España was lost in 1923... impossible she ground on the return to Spain in 1924. And ¿4 years in Chile?
thx --[[User:Takashi kurita|Takashi kurita]] ([[User talk:Takashi kurita|talk]]) 13:27, 11 June 2008 (UTC)
::All ok now... thanks--[[User:Takashi kurita|Takashi kurita]] ([[User talk:Takashi kurita|talk]]) 04:58, 12 June 2008 (UTC)
==Spanish Naval Jack==
The spanish naval jack, is official sice 11 December 1945 (see in www.mde.es official web ministery of defese... previously, spain use spanish flag like jack
sorry for my short english
--[[User:Takashi kurita|Takashi kurita]] ([[User talk:Takashi kurita|talk]]) 15:33, 14 July 2008 (UTC)
